function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid transfer of resources (particularly human resources and technical skills) from one project to another","Impact":"Decreased capacity to handle the original project and potential decrease in quality of work","Mitigation":"Implement clear protocols for resource transfer and assess the impact on original project before making transfers","Technologies":"Project management software for resource allocation and tracking","People":"Employees, customers relying on the original project","Owner":"Project managers, team leaders, business owners"},{"Description":"Change in customer expectations and service requirements due to pandemic","Impact":"Inability to meet new customer demands, loss of business, and reduced customer satisfaction","Mitigation":"Conduct market research to understand new customer needs, adjust service offerings accordingly, and communicate effectively with customers","Technologies":"Survey tools, customer relationship management (CRM) software, communication platforms","People":"Service providers, business owners, customers","Owner":"Business owners, marketing and sales teams"},{"Description":"Decoupling of service offerings to adapt to new customer requirements","Impact":"Potential loss of coherence in service offerings and brand identity, confusion among customers","Mitigation":"Develop a clear strategy for decoupling and ensure consistency in branding and communication","Technologies":"Brand management software, customer feedback and analytics tools","People":"Service providers, business owners, customers","Owner":"Business owners, marketing and brand management teams"}]}
